results.name: Distance between the smaller members of successive twin prime pairs.
comment: Conjecture: a(n) < log(A014574(n))^3 for n > 2. - _Thomas Ordowski_, Jul 21 2012
This is of course also the distance between the larger members of successive twin primes. - _Franklin T. Adams-Watters_, Jun 03 2014
link: M. F. Hasler, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..107406
program: write("b053319.txt",cnt++" "p-ltp);/* print1(p-ltp", ");*/ ltp=lp=p)} \\ _M. F. Hasler_, May 26 2007
xref: First differences of A001359, A006512, and of A014574.
